mapper.select: select m.MANUAL_TASK_SEQ, m.MANUAL_TASK, m.REPEAT_DETAIL, s.SPACE_TYPE from manual_tasks m, space_types s where REPEAT_TYPE='기간' and m.SPACE_TYPE_SEQ=s.SPACE_TYPE_SEQ order by SPACE_TYPE asc
select count(DAILY_TASK) from DAILY_TASKS where ASSIGN_DATE between to_date(#{date}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')-#{REPEAT_DETAIL} and to_date(#{date}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')+1 and MANUAL_TASK_SEQ=#{MANUAL_TASK_SEQ}

select m.MANUAL_TASK, s.SPACE_TYPE, t.TASK_TYPE from MANUAL_TASKS m, SPACE_TYPES s, TASK_TYPES t where m.space_type_seq=s.space_type_seq and m.task_type_seq=t.task_type_seq and m.MANUAL_TASK like #{inputText}
select distinct task_type from manual_tasks m, space_types s, task_types t where m.space_type_seq = s.space_type_seq and m.task_type_seq = t.task_type_seq and s.space_type=#{spaceType}
select distinct space_type from manual_tasks m, space_types s, task_types t where m.space_type_seq = s.space_type_seq and m.task_type_seq = t.task_type_seq and t.task_type=#{taskType}

select manual_task, repeat_type, repeat_detail from manual_tasks m, space_types s, task_types t where m.space_type_seq = s.space_type_seq and m.task_type_seq = t.task_type_seq and s.space_type=#{spaceType} and t.task_type=#{taskType}
select manual_task_seq from manual_tasks where manual_task=#{searchTask}
